<div className="flex justify-center gap-10 py-8">
        <button
          className={`w-40 h-40 rounded-2xl bg-[#ffffff60] justify-center items-center flex ${
            selectedGender === "male" ? "bg-white" : ""
          }`}
          onClick={() => setSelectedGender("male")}
        >
          {/* Male icon */}

        <button
          className={`w-40 h-40 rounded-2xl bg-[#ffffff60] flex justify-center items-center ${
            selectedGender === "female" ? "bg-white" : ""
          }`}
          onClick={() => setSelectedGender("female")}
        >

            viewBox="0 0 80 80"
